english.segment1: Well we're thrown out on a stage. To find our paths to yesterday. When the world was so much smaller. And we were free, free to be
english.segment2: Well we all moved to the big town. And we all put on the big sound. Truly what would we sing for. If it wasn't for Your Grace
english.segment4: And we sing 'cause You are bigger. Than any reference we could make. And we dance until we're tired. 'Cause we know Your name is great
english.segment5: On our journey give us Grace. As we follow lines Your hand will trace. You have called us to a crown. But for a time, to taste the ground. Give us edge by ones You love. Shrewd as snakes and harmless as doves. Songs will always find their endings. But Your story never dies, that's why
english.segment6: And we sing 'cause You are bigger. Than any reference we could make. And we dance until we're tired. 'Cause we know Your name is great
english.segment7: And we sing 'cause You are bigger. Than any reference we could make. And we dance until we're tired. 'Cause we know Your name is great
